annoGroup.heading: History
annoGroup.annotation: as added Mar. 2, 1991, D.C. Law 8-196, § 2, 37 DCR 6735

annoGroup.heading: Expiration of Law
annoGroup.text: Section 3(b) of D.C. Law 8-196, as amended by § 2 of D.C. Law 10-133 and § 2 of D.C. Law 10-213, provided that the act shall expire 6 years after its having taken effect.

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Pursuant to Law 10-213 this section expired on March 3, 1997.
